name: Appboxo Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an open SaaS platform designed to help creators launch an app within apps. The company's platform allows users to launch mini-apps within an app without downloading which is loaded instantly to integrate various services, enabling developers to avail tools to make performant and customized mini-apps to increase the utility of their apps and enhance user experience.
one_liner: Developer of an open SaaS platform designed to help creators launch an app within apps. The company's platform allows users to launch mini-apps within an app without downloading which is loaded instantly to integrate various services, enabling developers to avail tools to make performant and customized mini-apps to increase the utility of their apps and enhance user experience.
